metadata.description: Online 25-word-or-less competition scouting skills - Scrape, analyze, compose entries, persist to GitHub. For '25 words or less' style competitions.

plugins.name: competition-scout
plugins.description: Skills for competition scouting: comp-scout-scrape (Playwright + LLM interpretation), comp-scout-analyze (strategy with tone matrix), comp-scout-compose (entry generation with arc patterns), comp-scout-persist (GitHub issues with deduplication). Targets Australian competition sites.
